body_html: I'm OK with the static_cast and THHalf fixes coming in a separate PR. I'm a little concerned about the change in conversion behavior, but if you think that it is sound, this can go in as is (since it is blocking other work).
body_text: I'm OK with the static_cast and THHalf fixes coming in a separate PR. I'm a little concerned about the change in conversion behavior, but if you think that it is sound, this can go in as is (since it is blocking other work).
body: I'm OK with the `static_cast` and `THHalf` fixes coming in a separate PR. I'm a little concerned about the change in conversion behavior, but if you think that it is sound, this can go in as is (since it is blocking other work).
